revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DSA-3200 |revision=A1 |upc=790069274329 |asin=B0007COBG0 |est_release_date=01/2006 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Alpha Networks |availability=uncommon |type=hotspot gateway |fcc_id=RRK2003120027-1 |pcb_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.2 |pwr_barrel_len=10 |cpu1_brand=Intel XScale |cpu1_model=IXP420;FWIXP420BB; |cpu1_cspeed=266 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=TE28F128J3C-150 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Mira |ram1_model=P2V28S40BTP |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Alpha Networks WMP-G03 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3880 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3686A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=D-Link |eth_chip2_model=DL10030B |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model=IP175C |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=Airspot |default_ssid_regex=^Airspot$ |default_ip=192.168.0.40 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:13:46 |oui_eth=00:0F:3D }} {{TagLine|Airspot Wireless G Public/Private Gateway}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=D-Link|model=DSA-3200|vs_id=402}} {{â€¢}} [ftp://ftp.dlink.com/Gateway/dsa3200/Manual/DSA-3200_Manual_100.pdf Manual]
"8SA3100..2B1" and "0536" is etched onto the bottom of the board.
The [[Intel XScale]] CPU (FWIXP420BB) is part of the [http://www.intel.com/p/en_US/embedded/hwsw/hardware/ixp-4xx IXP42X product] :The DL10030B [[D-Link DFE-530TX+ rev F1|should be a '''VIA''' based network controller]]. :The wireless card is soldered onto the Mini PCI retaining clips..
The LAN ports are divided into private (x2) and public (x2). :The administrator account can only login from the private LAN.
==Images== <gallery caption="bad quality scans"> File:D-Link DSA-3200 board in case.jpg|board in case File:D-Link DSA-3200 board top.jpg|board top, card removed File:D-Link DSA-3200 board bot.jpg|board bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
